titleStmt.title: An exposition with practicall observations continued upon the twenty-second, twenty-third, twenty-fourth, twenty-fifth, and twenty-sixth chapters of the book of Job being the summe of thirty-seven lectures, delivered at Magnus near London Bridge. By Joseph Caryl, preacher of the Word, and pastour of the congregation there.
titleStmt.author: Caryl, Joseph, 1602-1673.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by M. Simmons, and are to be sould at her house in Aldersgate-streete the next dore to the Gilded Lyon,

notesStmt.note: A variant of the edition with John Allen and Joseph Barber named as booksellers in imprint (Wing C769).
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.

place.placeName: her house in Aldersgate-streete the next dore to the Gilded Lyon
